description: Baaghi 4 continues the franchise’s legacy of action and heartfelt emotion. Ronnie’s journey from trauma to resilience, packed with thrilling stunts, emotional highs, and captivating visuals, makes it a standout entry. The movie highlights Tiger Shroff’s performance, supported by Harnaaz Sandhu, Sanjay Dutt, and Sonam Bajwa, blending action, suspense, and human drama effectively. The film is expected to land on Amazon Prime Video on October 31, as per reports.
title: Baaghi 4 Starring Tiger Shroff Reportedly Set to Land on OTT: Everything You Need to Know

description: Dark matter, though invisible, might subtly alter the colour of light passing through it, according to a new University of York study. Researchers propose that weak particle interactions could create faint red or blue tints, offering a new path for future telescopes to detect dark matter indirectly.
title: Dark Matter Might Leave A Faint Colour Mark In Light, Say Scientists

description: M3gan 2.0 is set to land on the digital screens soon, where it will stream on JioHotstar. The cast of M3gan 2.0 includes Jenna Davis, who voices M3gan, along with Amie Donald, Allison Williams, Violet McGraw, Brian Jordan Alvarez, Ivanna Sakhno, and more, in prominent roles. It is expected to debut on Oct 27th, 2025, on JioHotstar in Hindi and English languages.
title: M3gan 2.0 OTT Release Date Revealed: Know When and Where to Watch Sci-Fi Horror Film Online

description: ESA satellites have recorded the world’s largest ocean swells — nearly 20 meters high — generated by Storm Eddie in the North Pacific. These giant waves carried storm energy over 24,000 kilometers, reaching distant coasts and proving that ocean swells can transport immense power across the globe even when storms stay offshore.
title: Satellites Capture Record-Breaking 20-Metre Waves Crossing Entire Oceans

description: Scientists discovered that a tiny nematode leaps toward flying insects using static electricity. The findings reveal how electrostatic forces drive predator-prey interactions and could reshape how we understand small-scale ecosystems.
title: Scientists Discover Parasitic Worms That Hunt Using Static Electricity

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival Sale “Diwali Special” is live in India until October 20, offering shoppers discounts across electronics, home appliances, and personal tech gadgets. Highlights include deals on smartphones, laptops, and smartwatches. HDFC Bank credit cardholders can get 10 percent instant discount with EasyEMI up to Rs. 24,000, while Amazon Pay ICICI Bank Credit Card users earn unlimited 5 percent cashback. This roundup focuses on the best smartwatch deals for runners and athletes, helping buyers grab fitness-focused wearables before the sale ends.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: The Ultimate Deals on Smartwatches for Runners During the Amazon Sale

description: Bridgerton Season 4, one of the most-anticipated releases of the year, is set to arrive soon. The makers have announced that the season will premiere in two parts: Part 1 on January 29 and Part 2 on February 26. Season 4 of Bridgerton focuses mainly on Benedict Bridgerton, who is also the second-oldest son of the Bridgerton family.
title: Bridgerton Season 4 To Begin Streaming on Netflix in 2026: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra design has leaked again, this time via a case maker. The design is in line with the recently shared CAD renders of the phone, which suggest that it might carry a redesigned quad-rear camera module. The smartphone was shown in a black colourway, with a flat back panel and a flat metal frame. It is expected to be powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 for Galaxy chipset, coupled with a 5,000mAh battery.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Design, Black Colourway Leaked via Case Manufacturer

description: SpaceX’s Falcon 9 rocket successfully launched 21 satellites for the U.S. Space Development Agency on Oct. 15 from Vandenberg Space Force Base. These satellites form part of the Tranche 1 Transport Layer, a new orbital network designed to provide secure, rapid global communications for military operations.
title: SpaceX Launches 21 Satellites With Second Falcon 9 Launch Of The Year

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival Diwali Special sale is currently live in India. Brands like Samsung and Xiaomi are selling their popular fitness bands at affordable price tags in the sale. Some models are bundled with fast chargers and offer several health tracking features. The discount sale will end on October 20.
title: Amazon Diwali Sale 2025: Top Fitness Bands Under Rs. 5,000 You Can Purchase Right Now

description: Anand Deverakonda stars in Takshakudu, a dark Telugu thriller directed by Vinod Anantoju and set for an exclusive Netflix release. Inspired by myth and morality, the story unfolds after a curse consumes a village, blending rural realism with supernatural mystery. Details about its release date will be announced at a later date.
title: Anand Deverakonda’s Takshakudu Set for OTT Release on Netflix: All You Need to Know

description: Anthropic has launched Claude Haiku 4.5, the smallest model in its Claude 4.5 series. Focused on speed and real-time performance, it’s said to be twice as fast as Sonnet 4 while maintaining similar coding capabilities. Available for free, Haiku 4.5 outperforms rival models in several benchmarks and is rated Anthropic’s safest model to date.
title: Anthropic Releases Claude Haiku 4.5 as a Fast and Cost-Effective AI Model

description: Meta and Arm have entered a multi-year partnership to make AI systems faster and more energy-efficient. The collaboration combines Arm’s low-power chip design expertise with Meta’s AI infrastructure to enhance performance across data centres and devices. Together, they aim to scale efficient AI tools and hardware for over three billion users worldwide.
title: Meta Inks Multi-Year Partnership With Arm to Help Scale Future Meta AI Features and Models

description: To elevate the commercial spaceflight and enforce innovation, NASA has decided to deorbit the International Space Station (ISS) by the year 2030. A new space station will replace ISS. Significantly, the ISS will be redirected to a remote region in the Pacific Ocean.
title: NASA Plans To Deorbit The ISS By 2030, to Transition to Private Space Stations

description: Oppo Find X9 Pro and Find X9 feature 1.5K LTPO displays, 6.78‑inch Pro and 6.59‑inch, respectively, with 120Hz refresh rate, 1800 nits peak brightness, HDR Vivid, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, and full-screen AOD. Both run on MediaTek Dimensity 9500, with up to 16GB RAM and 1TB storage, on Android 16-based ColorOS 16. Cameras include triple rear setups, Pro with a 200-megapixel telephoto, and base X9 with 50-megapixel telephoto sensors. Batteries are 7,500mAh on the Pro and 7,025 mAh on the standard model.
title: Oppo Find X9 Pro, Oppo Find X9 Launched With Dimensity 9500 SoC, Hasselblad-Tuned Cameras: Price, Features

description: Oppo Pad 5 was launched in China alongside the Find X9 series. The tablet runs on MediaTek's Dimensity 9400+ chipset, with up to 16GB RAM and up to 512GB onboard storage. The Oppo Pad 5 is released in four colours with a 12.1-inch LCD panel. It runs on ColorOS 16 based on Android 16 and packs a 10,420mAh battery which can be charged at 67W.
title: Oppo Pad 5 With MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ Chipset, 10,420mAh Battery Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Oppo Watch S was launched in China by the tech firm on Thursday, along with the Oppo Find X9 series. The company also launched the Oppo Pad 5 during its October 2025 event. The new smartwatch will be available in the country via the company’s online store in three colourways. It will be offered with two strap options, depending on the colourway the user buys. It weighs about 35g and measures 8.9mm in thickness.
title: Oppo Watch S Launched With Temperature Monitoring, 16-Channel SpO2 Sensor: Price, Specifications

description: World Liberty Financial plans to tokenise a real estate project using its USD1 stablecoin, according to WLFI Co-Founder Eric Trump. The project aims to open access to fractional ownership in luxury properties for retail investors, starting from $1,000 (roughly Rs. 87,400). While the Trump family maintains control over WLFI, the move underscores blockchain’s growing role in democratising real estate investment and integrating traditional assets with digital infrastructure.
title: World Liberty Financial Explores Real Estate Tokenisation Using USD1 Stablecoin

description: EA has a big hit with Battlefield 6. The shooter has reportedly sold seven million copies in just five days since it launched on October 10. Battlefield 6 is also said to have generated $350 million
title: Battlefield 6 Has Reportedly Sold 7 Million Copies in Just 5 Days After Launch

description: Japan has reportedly asked OpenAI to halt copyright infringement linked to its Sora 2 video model, which can recreate famous anime and game characters like Pikachu and Goku. The government’s formal request highlights rising concerns over AI-generated media using Japanese IP without consent. OpenAI recently switched Sora to an opt-in policy for rights holders.
title: Japan Tells OpenAI to Stop Using Mario, Pikachu, and Anime Characters in Sora 2 Videos: Report

description: WhatsApp is reportedly working on a Channel Quiz feature for Android users, which could allow channel admins to enhance engagement. It is said to be available to users as part of a future update. The purported Channel Quiz feature could appear in the Attachment menu in the channel window. It will reportedly allow admins to test the knowledge of other channel members about a specific topic, while promoting “friendly competition”.
title: WhatsApp Channel Quiz Feature Spotted in Development, Could Launch Soon

description: Apple’s AI chief for Siri’s web-search revamp, Ke Yang, has reportedly left the company to join Meta. Yang led the “Answers, Knowledge and Information” team, developing a ChatGPT-like feature for Siri. His exit marks another key loss for Apple’s AI division, as multiple senior researchers have recently moved to Meta.
title: Apple Executive Leading Siri Revamp Project Reportedly Snagged by Meta

description: Gmail’s latest build version 2025.10.06.815599742.Release reveals that Google is developing two new automatic labels, namely “Bills” and “Travel.” While not yet active, the labels aim to expand Gmail’s smart categorisation system. Bills may focus on recurring payments like credit card or utility statements, while Travel will group emails related to flights, hotels, and car rentals. The exact rollout date is unknown, but their presence in the public build indicates that Google is testing the feature and could release it soon.
title: Gmail Working on Bills, Travel Inbox Labels for Easier Email Organisation: Report

description: Instagram has announced limited-edition Diwali-themed effects for Instagram Stories and its Edits app in India and select other markets. Users can enhance their photos and videos in Stories, as well as videos in the Edits app, and infuse them with the new special effects inspired by Diwali, as per the company. These effects will be available to use until October 29.
title: Instagram Rolls Out Diwali-Themed Meta AI-Powered Effects for Stories, Video Effects on Edits App

description: Reliance Jio has joined hands with Aptos Foundation and Aptos Labs to launch a blockchain-based rewards platform for its 500 million subscribers. Built on Aptos’ high-speed, low-cost blockchain, the system focuses on real-world utility over speculation. It’s currently in beta with 9.4 million users, and it represents one of the largest telecom-led Web3 integrations globally.
title: Reliance Jio, Aptos to Launch Blockchain Rewards for 500 Million Users

description: Samsung has reportedly cancelled the Galaxy S26 Edge, citing poor sales performance of the Galaxy S25 Edge as the primary reason behind the decision. The Galaxy S25 Edge was launched in May this year with a 5.8mm build. Samsung reportedly notified its employees about the discontinuation of the Edge series and Galaxy S26 Edge. The Galaxy S25 Edge could be discontinued after the existing stock is sold.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Edge Reportedly Scrapped; Galaxy S26 Lineup Could Comprise Three Models

description: Asus has officially put the ROG Xbox Ally and ROG Xbox Ally X on sale in India, alongside a new range of ROG accessories. The handheld consoles feature 7-inch full-HD displays with 120Hz refresh rates, AMD Ryzen Z2 series processors, Radeon graphics, and Xbox-inspired ergonomic controls for high-performance gaming on the go. Accessories such as docks, premium cases, and travel bags are also available via offline and online Asus stores and other authorised platforms.
title: Asus ROG Xbox Ally X Goes on Sale in India Alongside ROG Xbox Ally: Price, Features

description: Honor on Wednesday announced the launch of MagicOS 10. The MagicOS 10, based on Android 16, brings several notable upgrades focused on AI, connectivity, and personalisation. The new Magic 8 series ships with this new interface. It offers an improved Yoyo assistant and enable One-touch file transfer between different devices.
title: Honor Launches Android 16-Based MagicOS 10 With AI, Connectivity Upgrades: Eligible Devices, Rollout Schedule

description: Redmi Note 15 Pro and Redmi Note 15 Pro+ could be unveiled in India in January 2026, according to a report. The phones are expected to launch in the country with slightly different specifications than their Chinese counterparts. The handsets recently debuted in China as the successor to last year's Note 14 series. The Note 15 Pro and Note 15 Pro+ pack 7,000mAh batteries. The Pro+ model is equipped with a triple-rear camera unit, headlined by a 50-megapixel primary shooter.
title: Redmi Note 15 Pro+, Note 15 Pro India Launch Timeline, Price and Specifications Leaked

description: Silent Hill 2 remake, Yakuza: Like a Dragon, and Until Dawn remake are joining PS Plus Game Catalog in October. Other titles coming to the subscription service this month include survival RPG V Rising, interactive adventure title As Dusk Falls, puzzle horror title Poppy Playtime, and survival game Wizard with a Gun.
title: Silent Hill 2 Remake, Until Dawn and Yakuza: Like a Dragon Coming to PS Plus Game Catalog in October

description: Bitcoin maintained stability around the $111,000 (roughly Rs. 97.5 lakh) mark on Thursday as investors weighed prolonged US-China trade tensions and the ongoing US government shutdown. Despite renewed institutional inflows and ETF activity, traders stayed cautious ahead of fresh macro triggers. Ethereum held near $4,000 (roughly Rs. 3.51 lakh), while most altcoins traded sideways amid low volatility.
title: Bitcoin Price Steadies Above $111,000 Amidst Ongoing Trade Tensions

description: Google has introduced a special offer for Diwali that allows users to purchase additional Google Drive storage at highly reduced prices for a limited time. It is valid on the Lite, Basic, Standard, and Premium plans, enabling them to get up to 2TB of cloud storage across Drive, Gmail, and Photos. As per Google, users can also share the storage space offered with Basic, Standard, and Premium plans with others.
title: Google One Diwali Offer Provides Up to 2TB of Google Drive Storage for Just Rs. 11: See Offers

description: Google has rolled out Veo 3.1, the first major update to its AI video generator. The new version improves prompt accuracy and gives creators finer control, letting them add reference images or set the first and last frames to shape the video’s flow. It’s available via Flow and the Gemini API for developers.
title: Google Releases Veo 3.1 Video Model With Improved Controls and Longer Video Durations

description: Honor Robot Phone, carrying an artificial intelligence (AI)-enabled pop-up camera, was introduced by the company on Wednesday. The handset will act as an AI assistant that supports multi-modal intelligence. The camera is shown with a USB Type-C port, which could be utilised for attaching accessories. The tech firm has announced that the phone will be unveiled during next year's Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona.
title: Honor Robot Phone Concept With Pop-Up Camera Teased, Will Debut at MWC 2026

description: Apple has unveiled new hardware, a 14-inch MacBook Pro, Vision Pro, and iPad Pro, all powered by its M5 chipset. Built on a 3nm process, the 10-core CPU and GPU chip brings up to four times faster peak GPU performance. Apple says the M5 is designed for AI workflows, with Neural Accelerators optimising local model processing.
title: Apple M5 Chipset Launched With 4X Faster GPU for MacBook Pro, iPad Pro and Vision Pro

description: Apple on Wednesday unveiled an updated version of Vision Pro. While it retains most of the features of the original model that was introduced in 2023, the mixed reality headset is now powered by the latest Apple silicon M5 chipset. The Cupertino-based tech giant has also introduced a new cushioned Dual Knit Band for the Vision Pro, which is claimed to provide a more comfortable fit. The updated mixed reality headset ships with visionOS 26 and all of its new features.
title: Apple Vision Pro Refreshed With M5 Chipset and New Dual Knit Band: Price, Specifications

description: The Indian Computer Emergency Response Team (CERT-In), on October 15, released two vulnerability notes to warn Google Chrome and Chromium-based Microsoft Edge users of multiple security flaws. These vulnerabilities can be exploited by hackers, granting them unauthorised access to a user’s desktop. However, people can install the latest available version of these browsers to protect themselves from bad actors.
title: Google Chrome, Microsoft Edge Security Flaws: CERT-In Asks Users to Update to Latest Versions With Security Fixes

description: OnePlus 15 and OnePlus Ace 6 will launch in China on October 17. OnePlus, through Weibo, confirmed the arrival of new phones in its home country. The OnePlus 15 will run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. It will come with ColorOS 16, based on Android 16. The OnePlus Ace 6 is rumoured to run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC,
title: OnePlus 15 Launch Date Announced; OnePlus Ace 6 to Debut Alongside

description: Realme is set to unveil the Realme GT 8 series in China on October 21. Ahead of the launch, the brand has released new posters and teaser videos on Weibo, showcasing key features, colour variants, and the overall design of the devices. The
title: Realme GT 8 Pro Colour Options, Specifications Teased; Realme Reveals GT 8 Chipset, Camera Details

description: Dyson has launched the Dyson Purifier Cool PC1 – TP11 in India ahead of Diwali, targeting rising indoor pollution levels. Priced at Rs. 39,900, it features a fully sealed HEPA filtration system that captures 99.95 percent of ultrafine particles and an activated carbon filter with Tris to absorb odours and gases. With Air Multiplier technology delivering 290L/s airflow and 350-degree oscillation, it ensures whole-room purification. The purifier also offers smart connectivity via the MyDyson app and voice assistants for remote monitoring and control.
title: Dyson Purifier Cool PC1 – TP11 Launched in India With HEPA Filtration, Smart Controls: Price, Features

description: iQOO 15 will launch in India in November, the iQOO India CEO Nipun Marya (@nipunmarya) confirmed in an X (formerly Twitter) post. The exact launch date has yet to be announced. It will be unveiled in China on October 20. The promotional image confirmed that the handset will be powered by Qualcomm's latest Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 chipset and will run on Android 16-based OriginOS 6 out of the box.
title: iQOO 15 India Launch Timeline Confirmed: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Vivo on Wednesday announced OriginOS 6 for its handsets in the global markets, replacing the existing FuntouchOS. The Android 16-based operating system (OS) is claimed to “redefine” human-computer interaction in the age of artificial intelligence (AI). Among the many changes is the new Origin Smooth Engine, which promises a smooth user experience by optimising the system’s core modules, computing, storage, and display. There are new motion effects, customisation options, fonts, and AI features in the update.
title: Vivo Announces Android 16-Based OriginOS 6 Globally With Origin Animation, AI Features: Release Timeline

description: Dreame F10 is the newest budget-friendly robot vacuum cleaner from the Xiaomi-backed brand in India. It has a 5,200mAh battery and delivers up to 13,000Pa of suction power. But does it stand out in the market? We find out in this review.
title: Dreame  F10 Review: Good Cleaning Performance for an Affordable Price

description: Google’s Pixel 10 Pro Fold may appear very similar to last year’s model, but it does pack in plenty of upgrades under the hood. There’s a more power-efficient Tensor G5 processor, an IP68-rated design that now resists both dust and water, and finally Pixel Snap, which will let you snap on all sorts of official and third-party accessories to this foldable.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Review: Hinging on Innovation

description: Redmi K90 and Redmi K90 Pro Max will be launched in China soon, the company announced on Thursday. After introducing a ‘Pro Max’ variant in its numbered series, Xiaomi is also bringing it to its sub-brand’s upcoming performance-focused sub-flagship lineup. During a livestream, a Xiaomi official confirmed the moniker of the Redmi K90 Pro Max. Although specifications remain under wraps, the upcoming handset is rumoured to run on the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, competing with other flagship handsets in the market.
title: Redmi K90, Redmi K90 Pro Max Set for China Launch in October; Teased to Be Priced Under Rs. 50,000

description: Oppo Find X9 series is all set to be launched today (October 16) in China. The upcoming lineup is expected to comprise two models — Oppo Find X9 and Find X9 Pro, which will be unveiled alongside the Oppo Pad 5. From expected price to specifications, here is all you need to know about the Oppo Find X9, Oppo Find X9 Pro, and Oppo Pad 5 ahead of their launch today.
title: Oppo Find X9, Oppo Find X9 Pro and Oppo Pad 5 Launching Today: Know Price, Features, and Specifications
